title: Revenue Management for Hotel Groups
description: Maximise your revenue using revenue management for hotel groups. Navigate pricing for multiple hotels, save hours and always stay in control.
content: ## Thesmartest revenue management systemfor your group Maximize the revenue from your group using automated dynamic pricing. Easily navigate pricing for multiple hotels, saving hours and always staying in control. ## Thesmartest revenue management systemfor your group Maximize the revenue from your group using automated dynamic pricing. Easily navigate pricing for multiple hotels, saving hours and always staying in control. ## Looking after the pricing formultiple propertieshas never been so easy RoomPriceGenie gives you price recommendations that you understand and can control. ## A revenue management system that grows with you ## Group-wide control with local flexibility Managing multiple hotels means balancing brand-wide strategy with the unique pace and rhythm of each property. RoomPriceGenie gives you both. Set pricing parameters at the group level, then let each hotel adapt in real time to its own demand. Your GMs stay empowered to make local tweaks, while you ensure pricing stays consistent, strategic, and aligned with group goals. ## One dashboard, total oversight Get a single, clear view of all your properties. Monitor performance, compare revenue metrics, and track pricing behavior across your portfolio. It’s everything you need for smarter hotel revenue management—just laid out clearly and ready when you are. ## Give your GMs the tools, keep the overview Your local teams know their market best. With RoomPriceGenie, they get automated pricing that reacts to demand in real-time, while you stay in control of the big picture. ## Revenue clarityfor every hotelin your group In hotel groups, visibility is everything. You need to understand how each property is performing, without micromanaging or chasing numbers. RoomPriceGenie brings clarity to your revenue landscape, making pricing transparent, scalable, and easy to manage across locations. Each hotel in your group gets its own pricing updates—up to 24 times a day—based on local demand, pick-up pace, and competitor trends. Whether it’s a beachfront resort or a city center boutique, RoomPriceGenie optimizes prices, helping each property reach its full potential without needing daily oversight. See what’s happening now and what’s coming up at a glance. Our visual calendar shows price changes, trends, and controls for each property. It’s easy to spot opportunities or make quick adjustments, all from one central place. Compare performance across your portfolio in just a few clicks. Track occupancy, revenue growth, ADR, and more, sorted by region, brand, or market type. It’s never been easier to spot patterns, reward great performance, or find opportunities to grow. Set rules for your group, then let each property run. Whether it’s dynamic minimum stays, rate caps, or event-based pricing, RoomPriceGenie follows your logic while staying nimble enough to adapt locally. It’s consistent revenue management that works even when you’re not watching. If a property sees a sudden spike in demand, say from a local event or group booking, our system picks it up fast and adjusts pricing automatically. Your properties stay competitive, never undersold, and always ready to capture demand when it matters most. Not managing a hotel group?RoomPriceGenie is built for independents, too.See how we help single-property owners boost revenue with less effort. ## Why chooseRoomPriceGenie? Learn more about how we can help you save time and increase revenue in a way that you will always feel comfortable with. Automation means your prices will adapt to changes in demand and supply much sooner than you could change them yourself. Each week, you save 10 hours of manual work so that you can focus more on what makes your hotel special. RoomPriceGenie has the best-in-class recommendation score on Hotel Tech Report. ## RoomPriceGenie works seamlessly with your existing solution With 70 integrations and counting—unleash the power of technology by connecting RoomPriceGenie to your PMS or your Channel Manager. Our autopilot integration means your pricing is always kept up-to-date, while you are busy doing other things. ## Trusted by over 4,000hoteliers around the world Switzerland ## Peter ## Sales Manager Weymouth, United Kingdom ## Steve ## Hotel owner “With the various sites, it would be impossible for us to have all the prices live under control. RoomPriceGenie takes a lot of effort away from us and we only have to make selective adjustments.” b_smart selection, Switzerland Paris, France ## Massiva &Emmanuel ## Hotel owner “With the various sites, it would be impossible for us to have all the prices live under control. RoomPriceGenie takes a lot of effort away from us and we only have to make selective adjustments.” b_smart selection, Switzerland ## Meet with one of ourrevenue managers Speak to us to learn how we can help you. In a 20-minute call we will discuss: - Your current situation and needs - Our approach to pricing automation - Your individual solution to bring your business to the next level ##
